QuestData.Title: Lay of the Land
QuestData.Description: Yes, yes. Welcome to Desolace, $r.$b$bSorry we had to be so insistent, but we're a small outpost, and there are big problems in this region - most of them quite urgent.$b$bBottom line: We need all the help we can muster.$b$bTo start with, our friend Vahlarriel over there has been getting pretty antsy, insisting that we send a contingent to visit the ruins to the east.$b$bWhy don't you go introduce yourself....
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Pentigast wants you to speak to Vahlarriel in Nijel's Point.
